analyzed: dhamma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalaṁ noupādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam no upādānam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
na kusalam na no upādānam dhammam paṭicca

original: Nakusalaṁ nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: na kusalam no kilesam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
na kusalam na no kilesam dhammam paṭicca
